name: TransferSupplyLot
description:
Transfers an SKU from a Supply Lot to the currently available inventory.

Check out how this transfer works in further detail by reading our [documentation](https://help.vtex.com/pt/tutorial/configurar-estoque-futuro--UMSGjooqRfkRbeoh94kS4) about this feature.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent

warehouseId.description: ID of the warehouse where the SKU is located.

supplyLotId.description: ID of the Supply Lot in which the SKU is currently located and from where it will be transfered.
